nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Jedi

Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Jedi is a children's book written by Marc Cerasini with interior design by Iain Morris. The book is told from Qui-Gon Jinn's point of view in 32 BBY, then switches over to Obi-Wan Kenobi's perspective at the very end.

My name is Qui-Gon Jinn. I am a Jedi. The Jedi are guardians of peace in the universe. We draw our strength from a mysterious power called the Force. I would be honored to tell you more. Just open this book and I will begin.
This is a gallery of the different cover variations of Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Jedi.
